questions.text: Who directed the 1993 movie 'Sleepless in Seattle'?
questions.explanation:
Nora Ephron.

	Nora Ephron also directed 'You've Got Mail', which saw Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan re-united again.

Tim Burton.

	This movie's cast included Christopher Lee, Miranda Richardson and Christopher Walken.

questions.text: Who directed and starred in the 1999 movie 'Guest House Paradiso'?
questions.explanation:
Adrian Edmonson.

	Adrian Edmonson and Rik Mayall have worked together since the late 1970's.

John Woo.

	John Woo's other movies include 'Mission: Impossible 2', 'Blackjack' and 'Broken Arrow'.

questions.text: Who directed the 1995 movie 'Vampire in Brooklyn'?
questions.explanation:
Wes Craven.

	This movie stars Eddie Murphy in a more serious role.

questions.text: Who directed and starred in the 1988 movie 'I'm Gonna Git you Sucka'?
questions.explanation:
Keenen Ivory Wayans.

	Keenen Ivory Wayans found true fame when he directed 'Scary Movie'.

questions.text: Who directed the 1991 movie 'New Jack City'?
questions.explanation:
Mario Van Peebles.

	Also appearing in this movie is Chris Rock.

Oliver Stone.

	'Wall Street' stars Charlie Sheen with father Martin amongst the cast.
